1.0.0.name: connect20/social-facebook-twitter
1.0.0.description: Facebook and Twitter is the most popular social networking site these days. To sell more products and connect to network citizens, many companies, organizations and stores have created their own Facebook fan page and Twitter accounts. But how to attract a lot of facebook and twitter users to join you? We would like to introduce an easy way to achieve that goal, that is using our extension Social. The fanbox of your Facebook fanpage and twitter box will appear left in your website.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
